description: The update strategy for a StatefulSet.

rollingUpdate.description: Rolling update configuration parameters. Present only if `type` is set to `"RollingUpdate"`. This is required for rolling update. It cannot be specified when `type` is not `"RollingUpdate"`.

type.description:
Type of the update strategy.

- `"RollingUpdate"` means that the update will be applied to all Pods with respect to the StatefulSet ordering constraints. New Pods will be created froom the `updateRevision`.
- `"OnDelete"` triggers the legacy behavior. Version tracking and ordered rolling restarts are disabled. Pods are recreated from the StatefulSet's spec when they are manually deleted, using the version specified in `currentRevision`.
